Module 2: Large Scale Transactional Databases

Bigtable

Calvin
  • Thomson, Alexander and Diamond, Thaddeus and Weng, Shu-Chun and Ren, Kun and Shao, Philip and Abadi, Daniel J, Calvin - Fast Distributed Transactions for Partitioned Database Systems, SIGMOD 2012, (Sec. 1-3 and 6)

Spanner
  • Corbett, James C. and Dean, Jeffrey and Epstein, Michael and Fikes, Andrew and Frost, Christopher and Furman, J. SLOG
  • Ren, Kun and Li, Dennis and Abadi, Daniel J, SLOG - Serializable, low-latency, geo-replicated transactions, VLDB 2019, (Sec. 1-4)

FaunaDB
  • Freels, Matt, FaunaDB - An Architectural Overview. You can skip the section entitled "Security" and everything from "Background Tasks" until the conclusion.

Amazon Aurora
  • Verbitski, Alexandre and Gupta, Anurag and Saha, Debanjan and Brahmadesam, Murali and Gupta, Kamal and Mittal, Raman and Krishnamurthy, Sailesh and Maurice, Sandor and Kharatishvili, Tengiz and Bao, Xiaofeng, Amazon aurora - Design considerations for high throughput cloud-native relational databases, SIGMOD 2017

Silo

11/30 Happy ending!
